questao.pergunta: In EL you may use the . operator to access maps and beans.
In EL you may use the [] operator to access maps, beans, lists and arrays.
Which of the following are EL implicit objects? (4 correct answers)
Which of the following are EL implicit objects? (2 correct answers)
Which of the following are EL implicit objects? (1 correct answer)
Which of the following EL implicit objects are maps? (3 correct answers)

Consider this code.
<%-- input.jsp --%> <html> <body> <form action="output.jsp"> <input type="text" name="yourname" value="Bond"/> <input type="submit" value="OK" /> </form> </body> </html>
<%-- output.jsp --%> <html> <body> Hello ${yourname} !! </body> </html>
What is the output when the form is submitted? (1 correct answer)

Consider this code.
<%-- input.jsp --%> <html> <body> <form action="output.jsp"> <input type="text" name="yourname" value="Bond"/> <input type="submit" value="OK" /> </form> </body> </html>
<%-- output.jsp --%> <html> <body> Hello ${request.yourname} !! </body> </html>
What is the output when the form is submitted? (1 correct answer)

Consider this code.
<%-- input.jsp --%> <html> <body> <form action="output.jsp"> <input type="text" name="yourname" value="Bond"/> <input type="submit" value="OK" /> </form> </body> </html>
<%-- output.jsp --%> <html> <body> Hello ${requestMap.yourname} !! </body> </html>
What is the output when the form is submitted? (1 correct answer)

Consider this code.
<%-- input.jsp --%> <html> <body> <form action="output.jsp"> <input type="text" name="yourname" value="Bond"/> <input type="submit" value="OK" /> </form> </body> </html>
<%-- output.jsp --%> <html> <body> Hello ${requestScope.yourname} !! </body> </html>
What is the output when the form is submitted? (1 correct answer)

Consider this code.
<%-- input.jsp --%> <html> <body> <form action="output.jsp"> <input type="text" name="yourname" value="Bond"/> <input type="submit" value="OK" /> </form> </body> </html>
<%-- output.jsp --%> <html> <body> Hello ${pageScope.yourname} !! </body> </html>
What is the output when the form is submitted? (1 correct answer)

Consider this code.
<%-- input.jsp --%> <html> <body> <form action="output.jsp"> <input type="text" name="yourname" value="Bond"/> <input type="submit" value="OK" /> </form> </body> </html>
<%-- output.jsp --%> <html> <body> Hello ${param.yourname} !! </body> </html>
What is the output when the form is submitted? (1 correct answer)

Consider this code.
<%-- input.jsp --%> <html> <body> <form action="output.jsp"> <input type="text" name="yourname" value="Bond"/> <input type="submit" value="OK" /> </form> </body> </html>
<%-- output.jsp --%> <html> <body> Hello ${param[yourname]} !! </body> </html>
What is the output when the form is submitted? (1 correct answer)

Consider this code.
<%-- input.jsp --%> <html> <body> <form action="output.jsp"> <input type="text" name="yourname" value="Bond"/> <input type="submit" value="OK" /> </form> </body> </html>
<%-- output.jsp --%> <html> <body> Hello ${paramValues.yourname} !! </body> </html>
What is the output when the form is submitted? (1 correct answer)

Consider this code.
<%-- input.jsp --%> <html> <body> <form action="output.jsp"> <input type="text" name="yourname" value="Bond"/> <input type="submit" value="OK" /> </form> </body> </html>
<%-- output.jsp --%> <html> <body> Hello ${paramValues[yourname]} !! </body> </html>
What is the output when the form is submitted? (1 correct answer)

Consider this code.
<%-- input.jsp --%> <html> <body> <form action="output.jsp"> <input type="text" name="yourname" value="Bond"/> <input type="submit" value="OK" /> </form> </body> </html>
<%-- output.jsp --%> <html> <body> Hello ${paramValues.yourname.0} !! </body> </html>
What is the output when the form is submitted? (1 correct answer)

Consider this code.
<%-- input.jsp --%> <html> <body> <form action="output.jsp"> <input type="text" name="yourname" value="Bond"/> <input type="submit" value="OK" /> </form> </body> </html>
<%-- output.jsp --%> <html> <body> Hello ${paramValues.yourname[0]} !! </body> </html>
What is the output when the form is submitted? (1 correct answer)

What is the output of this page? (1 correct answer)
<html> <body> Number ${14 + 3} </body> </html>

What is the output of this page? (1 correct answer)
<html> <body> Number ${"14" + 3} </body> </html>

What is the output of this page? (1 correct answer)
<html> <body> Result is ${2 > 3} </body> </html>

What is the output of this page? (1 correct answer)
<html> <body> Result is ${"2" > 3} </body> </html>

What is the output of this page? (1 correct answer)
<html> <body> Result is ${"a" > "b"} </body> </html>

What is the output of this page? (1 correct answer)
<html> <body> Result is ${"a" < "b"} </body> </html>

What is the output of this page? (1 correct answer)
<html> <body> Result is ${a < b} </body> </html>

What is the output of this page? (1 correct answer)
<html> <body> Result is ${"a literal"} </body> </html>

What is the output of this page? (1 correct answer)
<html> <body> Result is ${'a literal'} </body> </html>

alternativas.alternativa: An exception is thrown at runtime.

questao.pergunta:
What is the output of this page? (1 correct answer)
<html> <body> Result is ${"a literal" + " indeed."} </body> </html>

alternativas.alternativa: An exception is thrown at runtime.

questao.pergunta:
What is the output of this page? (1 correct answer)
<html> <body> Result is ${2 / 0} </body> </html>

<html> <body> Result is ${2 mod 0} </body> </html>

questao.pergunta:
What is the output of this page? (1 correct answer)
<html> <body> Result is ${null mod 1} </body> </html>

What is the output of this page? (1 correct answer)
<html> <body> Result is ${null + 1} </body> </html>

What is the output of this page? (1 correct answer)
<html> <body> Result is ${true and null} </body> </html>

What is the output of this page? (1 correct answer)
<html> <body> Result is ${empty null} </body> </html>

What is the output of this page? (1 correct answer)
<% request.setAttribute("list", new String[100]); %> <html> <body> Result is ${empty list} </body> </html>

What is the output of this page? (1 correct answer)
<% request.setAttribute("list", new String[0]); %> <html> <body> Result is ${empty list} </body> </html>

What is the output of this page? (1 correct answer)
<% String[] names = new String[]{"Rihanna", "Lopez", "Kylie"}; request.setAttribute("names", names); %> <html> <body> Hey ${request.names}!! </body> </html>

What is the output of this page? (1 correct answer)
<% String[] names = new String[]{"Rihanna", "Lopez", "Kylie"}; request.setAttribute("names", names); %> <html> <body> Hey ${request.names[0]}!! </body> </html>

What is the output of this page? (1 correct answer)
<% String[] names = new String[]{"Rihanna", "Lopez", "Kylie"}; request.setAttribute("names", names); %> <html> <body> Hey ${requestScope.names[0]}!! </body> </html>

What is the output of this page? (1 correct answer)
<% String[] names = new String[]{"Rihanna", "Lopez", "Kylie"}; request.setAttribute("names", names); %> <html> <body> Hey ${requestScope.names[12 - 12]}!! </body> </html>

What is the output of this page? (1 correct answer)
<% String[] names = new String[]{"Rihanna", "Lopez", "Kylie"}; request.setAttribute("names", names); %> <html> <body> Hey ${requestScope.names[<%= names.length - 2%>]}!! </body> </html>

What is the output of this page? (1 correct answer)
<% String[] names = new String[]{"Rihanna", "Lopez", "Kylie"}; request.setAttribute("names", names); %> <html> <body> Hey ${requestScope["names"]}!! </body> </html>

What is the output of this page? (1 correct answer)
<% String[] names = new String[]{"Rihanna", "Lopez", "Kylie"}; request.setAttribute("names", names); %> <html> <body> Hey ${requestScope["names"].0}!! </body> </html>

What is the output of this page? (1 correct answer)
<% String[] names = new String[]{"Rihanna", "Lopez", "Kylie"}; request.setAttribute("names", names); %> <html> <body> Hey ${requestScope["names"][0]}!! </body> </html>

What is the output of this page? (1 correct answer)
<% String[] names = new String[]{"Rihanna", "Lopez", "Kylie"}; request.setAttribute("names", names); %> <html> <body> Hey ${pageScope["names"][0]}!! </body> </html>

What is the output of this page? (1 correct answer)
<% String[] names = new String[]{"Rihanna", "Lopez", "Kylie"}; request.setAttribute("names", names); %> <html> <body> Hey ${names[0]}!! </body> </html>

What is the output of this page? (1 correct answer)
<% request.setAttribute("1007", Integer.valueOf(10)); %> <html> <body> Number is ${1007}!! </body> </html>

What is the output of this page? (1 correct answer)
<% request.setAttribute("1007", Integer.valueOf(10)); %> <html> <body> Number is ${"1007"}!! </body> </html>

What is the output of this page? (1 correct answer)
<% request.setAttribute("1007", Integer.valueOf(10)); %> <html> <body> Number is ${requestScope["1007"]}!! </body> </html>

What is the output of this code? (1 correct answer)
<% session.setAttribute("email", "session@info"); application.setAttribute("email", "application@info"); %> <html> <body> Contact an administrator at ${email}. </body> </html>

What is the output of this code? (1 correct answer)
<% request.setAttribute("email", "request@info"); session.setAttribute("email", "session@info"); %> <html> <body> Contact an administrator at ${email}. </body> </html>

What is the output of this code? (1 correct answer)
<% request.setAttribute("email", null); session.setAttribute("email", "session@info"); %> <html> <body> Contact an administrator at ${email}. </body> </html>
